comment.author: Sabrina
comment.text: Dear haters who choose to come onto ta support site to post your hate and ignorance - you only make us want to fight harder to help her win - the more you spout off right wing rhetoric - whether you support trump or bernie - you make us want her to win even more. AND we donate a couple of bucks to her campaign - So THANKS for the help and encouragement.

replies.author: Gianna
replies.text: So, the more I comment to you, the more you give away to a multi millionaire who doesn't need it? Oooooooook...

replies.author: Sabrina
replies.text: If you are addressing donating to the next president - yes
